text: Hello, my name is John and I would like to tell you about my daily routine. Every morning I wake up at seven o'clock and I have breakfast with my family. After that, I go to work by bus. I work in an office from nine to five. In the evening, I like to watch television or read books. I usually go to bed around eleven o'clock.

segments.text: Hello, my name is John and I would like to tell you about my daily routine.
Every morning I wake up at seven o'clock and I have breakfast with my family.
After that, I go to work by bus.
I work in an office from nine to five. In the evening, I like to watch television or read books. I usually go to bed around eleven o'clock.
